meanings.definition: The police force of a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The constabularies in our town keep us safe.
meanings.sent2: The constabularies work together to maintain law and order.
meanings.sent3: The constabularies were so busy chasing a cat that they missed the bank robbery.
meanings.sent4: The constabularies are the guardians of our community.
meanings.sent5: The constabularies are like the knights of modern times, protecting the realm.

meanings.sent1: I saw a group of constabularies patrolling the streets.
meanings.sent2: The constabularies arrived quickly at the scene of the accident.
meanings.sent3: The constabularies had a donut-eating contest to see who would be the top cop.
meanings.sent4: The constabularies formed a strong bond through their shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The constabularies are the unsung heroes of our society, working tirelessly to keep us safe.
